awardsHtml:
8 wins & 6 nominations

Primetime Emmy Awards

2015 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Sound Editing for Nonfiction Programming (Single or Multi-Camera)
Duncan Clark (dialogue editor) - Matt Snedecor (sound effects editor) - Suzana Peric (music editor) - John Carbonara (music editor) (For episode: "Poor Little Rich Boy".)
2015 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Sound Mixing for Nonfiction Programming
Tim Hays (production sound mixer) - Paul Vik Marshall (production sound mixer) - Coll Anderson (re-recording mixer) (For episode: "Poor Little Rich Boy".)
2015 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Cinematography for Nonfiction Programming
Marc Smerling (for episode: "Chapter 2: Poor Little Rich Boy")
2015 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Directing for Nonfiction Programming
Andrew Jarecki (for episode "Chapter 2: Poor Little Rich Boy")
2015 Winner Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Documentary or Nonfiction Series
Jason Blum (executive producer) - Zachary Stuart-Pontier (co-executive producer) - Marc Smerling (producer) - Andrew Jarecki (producer)

PGA Awards

2016 Winner PGA Award
Outstanding Producer of Non-Fiction Television
Marc Smerling - Andrew Jarecki - Jason Blum (Season 1)

American Cinema Editors, USA

2016 Winner Eddie
Best Edited Documentary - Television
Richard Hankin - Zachary Stuart-Pontier - Caitlyn Greene - Shelby Siegel

2016 Nominee Empire Award
Best Documentary
